questions.question: How do I create a budget for the month?
questions.answer: To create a monthly budget, go to the 'Budget' section, select the month you want to budget for, and enter your income and expense categories.

questions.question: Can I set savings goals?
questions.answer: Yes! You can set savings goals by navigating to the 'Savings' section and entering your target amount and deadline.

questions.question: How do I add a receipt?
questions.answer: You can add a receipt by selecting 'Add Receipt' in the app. You can either take a photo of the receipt or enter the details manually.

questions.question: What is the statistics page for?
questions.answer: The statistics page provides insights into your spending habits, and budget performance over time.

questions.question: Can I use dark mode in the app?
questions.answer: Yes! You can enable dark mode in the 'Settings' menu under 'Display Options.'

questions.question: How do I manage my account settings?
questions.answer: To manage your account settings, go to the 'Account Manager' section where you can change your password, verify your email, and adjust notification preferences.

questions.question: What should I do if I forget my password?
questions.answer: If you forget your password, click on 'Forgot Password' on the login screen, and follow the instructions to reset it.

questions.question: Can I delete my account?
questions.answer: Yes, you can delete your account in the 'Account Manager' section. Please note that this action is permanent.

questions.question: How do I create a shopping list?
questions.answer: To create a shopping list, go to the 'Shopping Lists' section and select 'Create New List.' You can then add items manually.

questions.question: Is there a way to track my expenses automatically?
questions.answer: Yes! You can set up automatic deposits for recurring expenses or incomes in the 'Budget' section.
